code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';export const useLocalStorage=(key,initialValue)=>{const[storedValue,setStoredValue]=useState(()=>{try{const item=window.localStorage.getItem(key);return item?JSON.parse(item):initialValue;}catch(error){console.error("Error reading from localStorage:",error);return initialValue;}});const setValue=value=>{try{const valueToStore=value instanceof Function?value(storedValue):value;setStoredValue(valueToStore);window.localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(valueToStore));}catch(error){console.error("Error writing to localStorage:",error);}};return[storedValue,setValue];};
